Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am an expert at creating fantasy video games. I will ask relevant questions to gather information and then use that information to create a new fantasy video game.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Write a detailed description for a new fantasy game based on the questions and answers above.

QApair.Question: What type of fantasy game do you want to create?
QApair.Answer: I want to create a role-playing game with an open world.

QApair.Question: What type of setting do you want your game to take place in?
QApair.Answer: I want my game to take place in a medieval fantasy world

QApair.Question: What type of story do you want your game to have?
QApair.Answer: I want my game to have a story that revolves around the player character's struggle to save her kidnapped brother.

QApair.Question: What type of gameplay do you want your game to have?
QApair.Answer: I want my game to have action-based gameplay with a mix of puzzles, exploration and one on one battles.

QApair.Question: What type of graphics do you want your game to have?
QApair.Answer: I want my game to have detailed, hand-drawn graphics that give the world a unique and fantastical feel

QApair.Question: What type of music do you want your game to have?
QApair.Answer: I want my game to have an epic orchestral score that accompanies the player on their journey.

QApair.Question: What type of controls do you want your game to have?
QApair.Answer: I want my game to have intuitive controls for navigation that allow the player to easily interact with the environment.

QApair.Question: What type of camera do you want your game to have?
QApair.Answer: I want my game to have a first-person camera that allows us to see the world from the main character's perspective.

QApair.Question: What type of user interface do you want your game to have?
QApair.Answer: I want my game to have a user interface that is clean and easy to use.

QApair.Question: What other features do you want your game to have?
QApair.Answer: I want my game to have a day/night cycle, a system that allows the player to level up their character, and the ability to make in-game purchases using coins collected throughout the quest.

QApair.Question: Is there anything else you can think of that you would like to add to your game?
QApair.Answer: The game is available on PC and Playstation. The name of the game is "Proda"

QApair.Question: Do you have a budget for your game?
QApair.Answer: Yes, the budget is 1 mil $.

Instances.Output: Proda is a new fantasy video game that takes place in a medieval world. The story revolves around the player character's struggle to save her kidnapped brother. The gameplay is action-based with a mix of puzzles, exploration and one on one battles. The graphics are detailed and hand-drawn, giving the world a unique and fantastical feel. The music is an epic orchestral score that accompanies the player on their journey. The game has intuitive controls for navigation and a clean, easy-to-use user interface. Other features include a day/night cycle, a system that allows the player to level up their character, and the ability to make in-game purchases using coins collected throughout the quest.
